Company: State of Indiana Official Website www.IN.gov
Description of incident: A hacker gained access to              the State Web site and obtained credit card numbers of individuals              who had used the site's online services and gained access to Social              Security numbers for 71,000 healthcare workers and 5,600 individuals and businesses.UPDATE             (3/22/07): Investigators have identified a teen they believe hacked              into the IN.gov as a prank.
